s.text: This is testament to Wall Street's faith that Rubin has been so successful that the White House won't dare change his pro-market policies.

This tightfistedness set the table for the current boom, leading to low interest rates, job growth, the Wall Street explosion, etc.
This tightfistedness set the table for the current boom, leading to low interest rates, job growth, the Wall Street explosion, etc.
Rubin is ascetic, controlled, rational, quiet, and untouched by any of the zillion Clinton scandals.

Rubin is ascetic, controlled, rational, quiet, and untouched by any of the zillion Clinton scandals.

But many economists, especially non-Americans, complain that Rubin has been far too obliging toward his old colleagues and indifferent to the poor Russians and bankrupted Koreans damaged by his decisions.

But many economists, especially non-Americans, complain that Rubin has been far too obliging toward his old colleagues and indifferent to the poor Russians and bankrupted Koreans damaged by his decisions.
In Rubin's defense, his stewardship of the economy has done more to help the poor than any federal grant program could have.
He arrived in Washington as a supposed champion of the poor.

But many economists, especially non-Americans, complain that Rubin has been far too obliging toward his old colleagues and indifferent to the poor Russians and bankrupted Koreans damaged by his decisions.

And instead of lobbying for large-scale anti-poverty or urban revival programs, Rubin settled for mini-government: small efforts to prod banks to extend credit in troubled neighborhoods, micro-loan programs to encourage entrepreneurship among the poor.

But many economists, especially non-Americans, complain that Rubin has been far too obliging toward his old colleagues and indifferent to the poor Russians and bankrupted Koreans damaged by his decisions.
Since then, Rubin's cautious advice has helped ensure that the administration did nothing to screw up the prosperity.
